exception.cbu_invalido: The CBU must have 22 numeric digits.
exception.nombre_titular_invalido: The cardholder's name must only contain letters.
exception.numero_tarjeta_invalido: The card number must have 16 numeric digits.
exception.codigo_seguridad_invalido: The security code must have 3 digits.
exception.vencimiento_formato_invalido: The expiration date must be in MM/YY format.
exception.pago_no_completado: The payment could not be completed, the purchase order was not generated.
